subtitle: Herfindahl-Hirschman Index of OI — concentration across strikes.

measures.how_to_read: Higher HHI = OI concentrated at few strikes; lower = dispersed.
measures.caveats: Needs robust chain snapshots; differs by ticker.
measures.what_it_measures: Oi Concentration Hhi derived from market data.

beginner_summary: Herfindahl-Hirschman Index of OI — concentration across strikes.
